body:
Ok guys so the championship game between the ducks and bucks is coming up very soon. What do you guys think about this match up? Any fans? Personally I like the ducks, despite being a stanford fan. I think this game will be close. oregon's offense is super hype! O-states offense is ok, compared to their defense. Overall this matchup will come down to playing smart ball! Go OREGON! Leave your thoughts/comments/opinions in replies :)

*p.s: write your opinions about the rose and sugar bowl games leading up to this! :)

-CP

replies.body: Well, I honestly didn't want to see Ohio State go to this matchup...I thought Alabama vs Oregon would've been an even better game..but oh well. :/ I'm personally Texas A&M fan- although I don't like Alabama, I wanted them to win for the SEC. But hey, I bet it will be a great game! Go Oregon! :D
